org.apache.flink.compiler.operators

Class AbstractJoinDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.compiler.operators.OperatorDescriptorDual
      • org.apache.flink.compiler.operators.AbstractJoinDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractOperatorDescriptor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HashJoinBuildFirstProperties, HashJoinBuildSecondProperties, SortMergeJoinDescriptor

    public abstract class AbstractJoinDescriptor
extends OperatorDescriptorDual
    Defines the possible global properties for a join.
